details.title: DMK chief Karunanidhi's mortal remains taken to Rajaji Hall in Chennai
details.content: Mortal remains of Karunanidhi moved to Rajaji Hall from his CIT colony residence. Public and political leaders will pay their final respects to the state's Tall leader here.

Mortal remains of late DMK chief #Karunanidhi wrapped in tricolour at Chennai's Rajaji Hall. #TamilNadu pic.twitter.com/R9hpksPCZG

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

details.title: Politicians, film personalities arrive to pay final respect to Karunanidhi
details.content: TTV Dhinakaran, Rajinikanth, Dhanush are among the first to pay final respects to the DMK chief. Several DMK supporters and public have gathered at the Rajaji Hall for a final glimpse of their favourite leader.

details.title: Tamil Nadu CM Edappadi Palaniswami pays homage to Karunanidhi
details.content: The Tamil Nadu CM accompanied by deputy CM O Panneerselvam and other AIADMK leaders visit Rajaji Hall to pay final respects to the late DMK chief.
This is a great loss for Tamil Nadu. My deep condolences to his family members & DMK party workers: Tamil Nadu CM E Palaniswami
Tamil Nadu governor Banwarilal Purohit visits Rajaji Hall to pay tributes to Kalaignar amidst chants by DMK cadre for Marina as final resting place.

Not just Chennai, the whole state has a deserted look today. 

#Ramanathapuram bus stand wore a deserted look. People who were waiting for bus till early mrng r transported by pvt cabs. Tricycle ws used to transport nearby villagers. #DMK cadres to protest against denial of space at merina for burial of #Karunanidhi @NewIndianXpress @ranjim pic.twitter.com/Ev40K8nQEm

— Thinakaran Rajamani (@thinakaran_TNIE) August 8, 2018
Governor Banwarilal Purohit pays homage to Karunanidhi
Hearing in case demanding land at Marina beach for burial of Karunanidhi resumes at Madras HC: Media reports
Marina land row: Tamil Nadu government files its counter affidavit in the case. (ANI)
Marina land row: Lawyer of petitioner Traffic Ramaswamy says 'We have no objection to the burial land for Karunanidhi'. Acting Chief Justice says to the lawyer 'Withdraw your case'. (ANI)
Former Kerala CM Oommen Chandy pays tribute to Dmk leader Karunanidhi at Rajaji hall.
Tamil film actors Ajith Kumar, Surya, Vikram Prabhu pay respects to the former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister at Rajaji Hall.

Scenes at Rajaji Hall @NewIndianXpress #RIPKalaignar pic.twitter.com/eaqQDpqDgX

— Sinduja (@j11_jane) August 8, 2018

Case against denial of burial land by Tamil Nadu Govt at Marina beach for M #Karunanidhi: Madras High Court dismisses petitions filed by Traffic Ramaswamy, K Balu & Duraisamy challenging construction of memorials at Marina beach. pic.twitter.com/lP6smWeM26

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

Case against denial of burial land by Tamil Nadu Govt at Marina beach for M #Karunanidhi: Madras High Court Acting Chief Justice records in his order, submissions made by DMK organising secretary RS Bharathi in his affidavit seeking burial land at Marina beach for Karunanidhi. pic.twitter.com/YxTYfahsTD

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

TN Govt states in its counter affidavit that DMK chief Karunanidhi himself didn't allot land for former CM Janaki Ramachandran after understanding the protocol manual when Karunanidhi was the CM. (ANI)

details.title: Tamil film fraternity pay tribute to DMK Chief M Karunanidhi
details.content: Tamil film stars Ajith, Surya and Vikram Prabhu arrived at the Rajaji Hall to pay their last respect to DMK Chief M Karunanidhi. (Photo| EPS)
We demand that Bharat Ratna be conferred upon Karunanidhi. We also demand that his memorial be made near Anna Samadhi: VCK chief Thol Thirumavalavan
DMK's lawyer at Madras HC says 'Anna, who is the founder of DMK, used to say my life & soul is Karunanidhi. Burying Karunanidhi next to Gandhi Mandapam cannot be termed as a decent burial.(ANI)

details.title: Tributes pour in for DMK patriarch Karunanidhi
details.content: VCK Leader Thol. Thirumavalavan, lyricist Vairamuthu, India cements head N. Srinavasan pay final respects to DMK chief Karunanidhi. (Photos: ANI, EPS)

details.title: DMDK president Vijayakanth's heartfelt condolence for the demise of DMK chief Karunanidhi
details.content:
முத்தமிழறிஞர் Dr. கலைஞர் அவர்களின் இழப்பு ஈடு செய்ய முடியாத இழப்பாகும். அவரை இழந்துவாடும் அவரது குடும்பத்தினருக்கும், உறவினர்களுக்கும், நண்பர்களுக்கும், கட்சியினருக்கும் என் ஆழ்ந்த இரங்கலை தெரிவித்துக்கொள்கிறேன். pic.twitter.com/WeiuqmCzkF

— Vijayakant (@iVijayakant) August 8, 2018

LIVE UPDATES from #MadrasHighCourt | DMK's lawyer says 'You (state govt) have announced state mourning, why not give land for burial? There's no prohibition under Central Govt protocol to allot land at Marina beach for ex-CMs'#KarunanidhiDeath

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Heavy security deployed outside Anna Memorial at Marina beach
details.content: (Photo: ANI)

Marina burial space hearing: There are 1 crore DMK followers in Tamil Nadu out of 7 crore population of the state. They'll be offended if burial land is not allotted for Karunanidhi at Marina beach, says DMK lawyer.

ADMK party flag flying at half-staff to mourn the passing of DMK leader #Kalaingar at A Kumaramangalam in Villupuram dist. @NewIndianXpress pic.twitter.com/oTi50UqHOP

— Bagalavan Perier B (@Bagalavan_TNIE) August 8, 2018
Marina burial space case: Senior Counsel CS Vaidyanathan argues on behalf of Tamil Nadu government at the Madras High Court.

details.title: State government's lawyer accuses DMK of pursuing political agenda
details.content:
LIVE UPDATES from #MadrasHighCourt | Tamil Nadu govt's lawyer says 'DMK is pursuing political agenda by filing this case. DK Chief Periyar was the tallest leader of Dravidian movement. Was he buried at Marina beach?' #KarunanidhiDeath

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Counsel CS Vaidyanathan strongly opposes DMK's plea
details.content: Senior Counsel CS Vaidyanathan appearing for Tamil Nadu government strongly opposes the DMK plea stating that the protocol is different for the ex CM's. He also argued that late CM Janaki Ramachandran was not allowed to bury in Marina Beach.

details.title: Actor-turned-politician Kamal Haasan pays tribute to DMK chief Karunanidhi
details.content: Photo: ANI
Rapid Action Force has been deployed outside Anna memorial at Marina beach in Chennai. (ANI)

details.title: Public throng Rajaji hall to pay final respects for DMK chief Karunanidhi
details.content: (Photos: EPS)

details.title: PM Modi arrives in Chennai
details.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrives in Chennai to pay last respects to former Tamil Nadu CM and DMK chief Karunanidhi. He is welcomed by CM K Palaniswami and deputy CM O Panneerselvam and other AIADMK leaders.

#TamilNadu: PM Narendra Modi arrives in Chennai to pay last respects to DMK chief M #Karunandhi. pic.twitter.com/6FWth7AZnZ

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

LIVE from #MadrasHighCourt | Arguments are now over in the case against denial of burial land by Tamil Nadu Govt at Marina beach for M #Karunanidhi. Acting Chief Justice begins dictating orders.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Madras HC green signal: Karunanidhi to be buried at Marina
details.content:
LIVE | It's official - #MadrasHighCourt reaches verdict, allows DMK leader M Karunanidhi's mortal remains to be buried in Marina beach behind Anna's Memorial in Chennai.#KarunanidhiDeath

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Both houses adjourned
details.content:
#RIPKarunanidhi Both houses of Parliament pay homage to M Karunanidhi; RS chairman M Venkaiah Naidu & LS Chairperson Sumitra Mahajan read out condolence messages recalling late leader's services; both Houses adjourned for the day, reports @muruga_TNIE. https://t.co/vBmDo45ClS

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: PM arrives at Rajaji Hall
details.content: PM Narendra Modi arrives at Rajaji hall to pay last respects to DMK chief Karunanidhi amidst loud chants from the party cadres.

Prime Minister Narendra Modi pays last respects to former CM M #Karunanidhi at Chennai's Rajaji Hall. #TamilNadu pic.twitter.com/IlO5LpP93F

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

details.title: Stalin breaks down on hearing Madras HC green signal for Karunanidhi burial
details.content: DMK working president and son of Karunanidhi, M K Stalin breaks down after hearing that the Madras HC has allowed his father to be laid to rest at Marina beach.

A DMK cadre starts his auto from #Ramanathapuram, carrying portrait of #Karunanidhi, speaker and mike set to inform the remote villagers of the district about his leader's demise @NewIndianXpress @ranjim pic.twitter.com/UTOGYEs2Xj

— Thinakaran Rajamani (@thinakaran_TNIE) August 8, 2018

PM Narendra Modi leaves Rajaji Hall premises after consoling MK Stalin and Kanimozhi. The DMK working president accompanies him up to his car. Modi was accompanied by Defence Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and Union Minister Pon Radhakrishnan.

#KarunanidhiDeath DMK principal secretary Durai Murugan inspecting the place behind Anna memorial in #MarinaBeach where DMK leader M Karunanidhi is to be laid to rest today.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

Celebration at Rajaji Hall after MH verdict @NewIndianXpress #Marina4Kalaingar pic.twitter.com/jS60VCNTMv

— Sinduja (@j11_jane) August 8, 2018

Tamil Nadu: DMK supporters gather outside Anna memorial at Chennai's Marina beach. JCB machines have also reached the spot following Madras High Court's judgement that M #Karunanidhi will receive burial at the Marina beach. pic.twitter.com/OP9MT9Oo5K

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

Place allocated for laying DMK president M Karunanidhi to rest alongside of his mentor Arignar Anna @NewIndianXpress pic.twitter.com/TvQ5KlHNvx

— T Muruganandham (@muruga_TNIE) August 8, 2018

#KarunanidhiDeath Security tightened at #MarinaBeach Anna Memorial as the venue gets ready for the burial of late DMK leader Karunanidhi, reports @SushmithaRam from Chennai.#RIPKalaignar pic.twitter.com/eyPMfMbNf2

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: DMK cadres tonsure head
details.content:
#DMK Cadres in #Coimbatore tonsured their head in a bid show their affection for the death of #DMKChief. #RIPKalaignar @NewIndianXpress pic.twitter.com/5havjrWlgg

— senthil kumar (@Senthil_TNIE) August 8, 2018

details.title: Tamil Nadu wears a deserted look as shops down shutters to pay respect to M Karunanidhi
details.content: Empty roads and closed shops seen at Madurai(top), Coimbatore (bottom right) and Tiruchy (bottom left). (Photo | EPS)

#KarunanidhiDeath DMK leader M Karunanidhi's funeral procession is likely to begin at 4.30 p.m., today, reports @muruga_TNIE from Chennai.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Work in progress at Anna memorial for last rites of M Karunanidhi
details.content: (Photo: Martin Louis/EPS)
Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal arrives in Chennai ; he is expected to reach Rajaji hall soon to pay homage to DMK president M Karunanidhi.
Tamil Nadu government accepts Madras HC verdict on allocation of land for burial of DMK president M Karunanidhi at Marina; not to challenge it, says Tamil Nadu Advocate General Vijay Narayan

details.title: DMK chief Karunanidhi's funeral procession to  start at 4 PM
details.content:
#KarunanidhiDeath Funeral procession of M Karunanidhi will start at 4 p.m today from Rajaji hall and will reach Anna memorial in #MarinaBeach via Sivananda Road, Periyar statue & Walajah Road in Chennai, @muruga_TNIE reports.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

A group of transgenders mourn the demise of DMK supremo M Karunanidhi at Khajapettai in Tiruchy.

 

(Photo: EPS | M K Ashok Kumar)

DMK president M Karunanidhi to take rest in this coffin with the words inscribed as per his wish: "Here lies the person who worked untiringly !" @NewIndianXpress pic.twitter.com/Go6FBs9g7Q

— T Muruganandham (@muruga_TNIE) August 8, 2018

People climb walls in an attempt to enter #RajajiHall after Police blocked hall entrance due to huge crowds #Karunanidhi pic.twitter.com/gQJKpOjs2t

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

details.title: Two killed in stampede at Rajaji Hall
details.content:
#KarunanidhiDeath Two killed and around 15 people injured in stampede at #RajajiHall in Chennai while paying homage to DMK leader Karunanidhi, reports @JayanthiPawar10.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

#KarunanidhiDeath At #Rajajihall in Chennai, DMK working president MK Stalin makes fervent plea to party cadre to maintain calm; his appeal comes in the wake of reports that two persons died there.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Maintain calm: MK Stalin to DMK cadre
details.content:
#KarunanidhiDeath At #Rajajihall in Chennai, DMK working president MK Stalin makes fervent plea to party cadre to maintain calm; his appeal comes in the wake of reports that two persons died there.

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

Congress leader Sonia Gandhi on Wednesday condoled the death of former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister M. Karunanidhi, describing him as a "father figure" who always showed great kindness and consideration to her.

READ HERE: Karunanidhi was like father figure, very kind, Sonia Gandhi in an emotional letter

details.title: Akhilesh, Tejashwi pay tributes to Karunanidhi
details.content:
Chennai:RJD's Tejashwi Yadav and SP's Akhilesh Yadav with MK Stalin at #RajajiHall. #Karunanidhi pic.twitter.com/HCy0H6g3zM

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

details.title: Congress President Rahul Gandhi pays last respect to Karunanidhi
details.content: The Congress President who landed in Chennai sometime back visits Rajaji hall to pay his last respects to DMK chief Karunanidhi.

Congress President Rahul Gandhi pays tribute to M #Karunanidhi at #RajajiHall pic.twitter.com/yMph9VmZNV

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

Congress President Rahul Gandhi pays tribute to M #Karunanidhi at #RajajiHall pic.twitter.com/yMph9VmZNV

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

READ HERE: Like Jayalalithaa, Karunanidhi deserves to be given space on Marina Beach: Rahul Gandhi

details.title: Telangana CM KCR pays tribute to DMK chief Karunanidhi
details.content:
Chennai: Chief Minister of Telangana K Chandrasekhar Rao paid tribute to M #Karunanidhi at #RajajiHall pic.twitter.com/Ggh3CPPKfk

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

Though a regional party leader, Karunanidhi, a 5-time CM, was a well-known name across the country and even beyond it.

Read: Here is how foreign media covered DMK chief M Karunanidhi's demise
2 dead and 33 injured in scuffle and stampede outside RajajiHall in Chennai, reports ANI.

details.title: Kerala CM pays tribute to the late DMK chief M Karunanidhi
details.content:
Kerala Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan, Governor P. Sathasivam, and Congress leader Ramesh Chennithala paid tribute to the DMK Chief at #RajajiHall. #Karunanidhi pic.twitter.com/95p8JMj4Q2

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

details.title: Puducherry CM pays floral tribute to DMK leader Karunanidhi at Puducherry legislative assembly
details.content: V Narayanasamy along with the ministers pays tribute to the late DMK chief on wednesday in Puducherry. (Photo: G Pattabiraman / EPS)

details.title: SC rejects Traffic Ramaswamy plea to stay last rites of M Karunanidhi at Marina beach
details.content:
Supreme Court refuses to entertain the plea filed by Traffic Ramaswamy seeking stay on the last rites of #Karunanidhi at #MarinaBeach. Ramaswamy had moved SC against the Madras High Court order which allowed to perform the last rites of #Karunanidhi at the Marina beach. pic.twitter.com/II9OwEgUWE

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018
BJP leader L Ganesan pays homage to DMK president M Karunanidhi on behalf of Kancheepuram Sankara Mutt and conveys Mutt's condolences to DMK working president MK Stalin.

Funeral procession of DMK president M Karunanidhi is about to start from Rajaji Hall ; Personnel of Armed Forces Making arrangements @NewIndianXpress

— T Muruganandham (@muruga_TNIE) August 8, 2018

details.title: Karunanidhi's last journey begins
details.content: Funeral procession of DMK president M Karunanidhi starts from Rajaji Hall followed by lakhs of party cadre.

Chennai: Mortal remains of DMK Chief M #Karunanidhi being taken to #MarinaBeach for last rites. pic.twitter.com/0q6j5EOzPE

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018
Funeral procession of DMK President M Karunanidhi now moves on Swami Sivananda Road.

details.title: Funeral procession of DMK chief M Karunanidhi

details.content:
LIVE | WATCH Late DMK chief Karunanidhi's funeral procession nears the statue of late Chief Minister Arignar Anna in Chennai's mount road, reports @muruga_TNIE. Video by @themerigala. #KarunanidhiDeath pic.twitter.com/jdUoiOBPOy

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: Tributes pour in for DMK chief Karunanidhi
details.content: Bengaluru based miniature artist Mallikarjuna Reddy shows a chalk sculpture of the late DMK leader and former Chief Minister M Karunanidhi in Bengaluru on Wednesday. The sculpture is 6mm thick and 10mm in height that took 4 hours to complete. (Photo | EPS / Pushkar V)
Funeral procession of DMK chief M Karunanidhi now moving on Walajah Road.

details.title: Tributes pour in from the neighbour
details.content: READ HERE: Sri Lankan leaders mourn demise of former Tamil Nadu CM Karunanidhi

details.title: Lakhs throng Marina beach to join M Karunanidhi's final journey
details.content: (Photo: Screengrab)

DMK working president MK Stalin, many key functionaries of the party are following the Army vehicle which carries the mortal remains of DMK president M Karunanidhi in his funeral procession @NewIndianXpress

— T Muruganandham (@muruga_TNIE) August 8, 2018

Since the funeral procession has to wade through the people, the army vehicle carrying the mortal remains of DMK president M Karunanidhi is now crossing University of Madras, reports TNIE's T Muruganandam.

Funeral procession of DMK president M Karunanidhi which began from Rajaji Hall at 4.05 p.m., after two hours, now moving on Kamarajar Road on Marina which is very close to Anna memorial @NewIndianXpress

— T Muruganandham (@muruga_TNIE) August 8, 2018

Chennai: Rahul Gandhi,Ghulam Nabi Azad, Andhra Pradesh CM N Chandrababu Naidu, TMC's Derek O Brien and others at last rites ceremony of #Karunanidhi pic.twitter.com/qTaqF5ID3g

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018

details.title: Karunanidhi's mortal remains reach Anna memorial
details.content:
LIVE | #KarunanidhiFuneral UPDATE | Mortal remains of DMK president M Karunanidhi reaches Anna memorial after 135 minutes of funeral procession, reports @muruga_TNIE.
Photo | Youtube screengrab.
More details here: https://t.co/Z8yazMSI9s pic.twitter.com/ofhWMmUiMz

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

Mortal remains of DMK president M Karunanidhi being taken to the burial site at Anna memorial, by Defence personnel @NewIndianXpress

— T Muruganandham (@muruga_TNIE) August 8, 2018

Political leaders from across the country including Congress president Rahul Gandhi, TMC MP Derek O Brian, Ghulam Nabi Azad, Union minister Pon Radhakrishnan, JD(S) leader Deve Gowda pay final respects to Karunanidhi at the Marina beach.

details.title: State honours accorded for M Karunanidhi
details.content: State honours being accorded to the five time CM of Tamil Nadu as his mortal remains lie in Marina beach near the Anna memorial.

Tamil Nadu Governor Banwarilal Purohit, State Minister D Jayakumar and Union Minister Pon Radhakrishnan pay tribute to #Karunanidhi at Marina beach pic.twitter.com/Mlky1of2pl

— ANI (@ANI) August 8, 2018
DMK working president MK Stalin receives the National Flag spread around the body of his father M Karunanidhi from Defence personnel.
Family members of DMK chief M Karunanidhi pay their last respects to the late leader.

details.title: DMK chief and former Tamil Nadu CM M Karunanidhi laid to rest at Marina beach
details.content: DMK stalwart and one of the most loved leaders in the state of Tamil Nadu, Muthuvel Karunanidhi, now lies alongside his mentor Anna near the Anna Memorial at the Marina Beach.
21 gun salute given for DMK chief M Karunanidhi

details.title: DMK chief and former Tamil Nadu CM M Karunanidhi laid to rest at Marina beach
details.content: DMK stalwart and one of the most loved leaders in the state of Tamil Nadu, Muthuvel Karunanidhi, now lies alongside his mentor Anna near the Anna Memorial at the Marina Beach.

details.title: Farewell Karunanidhi
details.content:
The end of an era! #RIPKarunanidhi pic.twitter.com/FzHkIl5tLN

— The New Indian Express (@NewIndianXpress) August 8, 2018

details.title: 'Here rests the man who worked tirelessly '- #RIPKarunanidhi
